summary: Silver-white Version of the Dragonplate armor.
descriptionHtml:
This is a retexture of the dragonplate (bone) armor. Took a couple of days to do this. All by hand. No filters or sharpening run over it. Textures as of right now are 4096x4096. Smaller versions will come soon.  Also make note there is GOLD metal accompanying this \"silver\" texture.  If there are enough requests I will do a dark metal version. 

Note: Spots on armor might appear BRIGHT in sunlight or well lit areas. This is intentional. It is to make the armor look more like BONE rather than some clay a crazy nord dug up and slapped on for armor. 

To make this work with the HI-Res texture pack out by bethesda you need to not use the Texture pack esp\'s and force them to load by adding HighResTexturePack01.BSA (and 02) Into your skyrim.ini on the line that loads archive files. You add these two bsa\'s AFTER textures.bsa.


 Install : 
Extract file, copy the data folder inside extracted file to Steam\\Steamapps\\Common\\Skyrim
Uninstall:
Delete the folder in CAPS : Steam\\Steamapps\\Common\\Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\Armor\\DRAGONBONE

 Alternatively use the Nexus Mod Manager for install/uninstall.
author: Nightshade
